titles.title: Are You Giving Thanks In All Things?

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Are you giving thanks in all things?
Are you praying without ceasing?
Are rejoicing in your present distress?
And making no provision for the flesh?
Are you speaking life to all men?
Are you speaking the truth in love?
Let your conversation be ordered aright.
And see the salvation of your God.
